transcript:
Customer: Hello
Executive: Hello
Customer: Hello. Haan sir bataiye.
Customer: Haan main keh raha aapne mail check lijiye maine kya mail kiya hai.
Executive: Ek second mail to aapne refund ke regarding hi kiya hai.
Customer: Ek baar aap check kijiye.

Executive: Sir aapne refund ke regarding aapne mail kiya na ki abhi tak aapka refund nahi hua hai right?
Customer: Yes yes mam uske liye kiya hai.
Executive: To sir uske liye already aapki sir se baat chal rahi hai aur refund ka process chal raha hai sir. Ye review two hamara complete ho jayega na. Sir ek hamari company karti nahi hai refund. Thik hai ab hum aapke kehne pe aapse discussion karne ke baad karwa rahe hain refund to aap fir aise baar baar complaint mere hi against raise kar rahe ho. Company refund nahi karti hai sir teen mahine ke baad.
Customer: Nahi ek cheez bataiye mam maine bahut pehle supply kiya hua hai. Thik hai aap ye bataiye refund mein time kitna lagta hai minimum?
Executive: Sir refund mein time to lagega na sir. Itni badi company hai aap process to hogi na sir aise to koi choti moti company to hai nahi. Aapko maine pehle bhi bola hai ki sir refund possible nahi hai sir aur aapke discussion karne ke baad main aapka refund kara rahi hu company allow nahi kar rahi hai aap meri against complaint raise kar rahe ho sir. Aur
Customer: Mujhe mujhe ek baat to bataiye refund kitne time mein ho jata hai?
Executive: Already aapki sir se baat ho gayi hai.
Executive: Sir already process mein chal raha hai review two ho jayega jaise ki sir ne aapko inform kiya tha ki review two jaise hi ho jayega sir aapka refund ho jayega.
Customer: Sir ne mujhe bola tha ki do din mein ho jayega mam. Hafte bhar se upar ho gaya hai. Hafte bhar se upar ho gaya hai.
Executive: Sab kuch ho gaya hai sir bas refund hona baki hai aapka refund ho jayega ye main mail already aapko mail bhi gaya hoga kuch cheezon ke liye aapki service already band ho chuki.
Customer: Sir aap
Executive: Aapke aapka refund ho jayega aapki service already band ho chuki hai.
Customer: Mam abhi nahi hua aur wo yu keh rahe the ki abhi bhi aapke charges kat rahe hain jab tak aap use kar lo jab aapka wo ho jayega hum aapko refund kar denge.
Customer: Aur mere charges bhi kat rahe hain.
Executive: Ye ye confirm hai 100% 100% surety de rahi hu aapka refund ho jayega sir. Sir hum karwa rahe hain hum wo wo baat thik hai aap keh rahe ho refund ho jayega thik hai par meri baat to suniye abhi jo time nikal raha hai uska charges to kat raha hai na mera.
Executive: To sir abhi aapki service band ho gayi hai ki aap ek baar buylead wagera use karke dekhna service already download ho chuki hai sir ab aap nahi use kar payenge service.
Customer: Aur mam unhone sir ne mujhse kaha tha ki do din ke andar aapka refund aa jaye.
Customer: Hafte bhar se upar ho chuka hai.
Executive: Abhi aapka service download ho chuka hai now refund process ho raha hai sir yahan se do do se teen din lagenge but ho jayenge aapko Saturday tak.
Customer: Aap mujhe confirm date main ye keh raha hu aap mujhe confirm date de sakte hain?
Executive: Sir dekhiye main aapko bata rahi hu Saturday tak aapka haan haan main confirm date bata rahi hu ye recorded line hai Saturday tak aapka refund ho jayega. Thik hai?
Executive: Aur sir main karwa rahi hu sir hum karwa rahe hain company to hame allow hi nahi kar rahi hai refund karne ke liye aap meri against hi complaint raise kar rahe ho baar baar.
Executive: Already sir aapko kuch na kuch mail to gaya hoga na refund ke regarding ye to hai na aapko surety ki refund hoga.
Customer: Mam kuch bhi nahi aaya.
Executive: Thik hai mere paas ek refund ka chota sa mail aaya hai main aapko share kar deti hu. Thik hai?
Customer: Thik hai mere paas kuch bhi update nahi aayi mam mujhe bas sir ne yu kaha tha do din mein aa jayega hafte bhar se upar ho gaya maine sir se baat kiya to unhone kaha aage se kabhi aa sakta hai mahine bhar mein 10 din mein aaya koi fix date nahi di gayi thi isliye maine wapas.
Executive: Saturday tak ho jayega sir aapka. Thik hai?
Customer: Aur jitna mam kat ke nahi aayega na jo date chal raha hai na ye kat ke nahi aana chahiye nahi main fir aap kuch aur aage action lunga mujhe jo main bataya gaya tha.
Executive: Kat ke nahi aana chahiye kya bol rahe ho jitne din aapne use kiya hai utne din ka kat ke aayega sir.
Customer: Haan lekin abhi jo ye date chal rahe hain na mam iske to nahi katenge na.
Executive: Abhi abhi aapki service download ho chuki hai thik hai.
Customer: Ab main na 10-15 din se use nahi kar raha tha unhone mujhe total bataya tha 25500 25500 ka bataya tha aap mujhe dekhiye confirm kariye ki isse niche nahi jana chahiye because maine uske baad use nahi kiya hai.
Customer: Thik hai na ab jo
Executive: To unhone confirm kiya tha ki itna amount refund hoga to itna hi amount refund hoga.
Customer: Haan to baki aap check wo keh rahe the isse ab bhi ho sakta hai isse kam nahi ho sakta. Thik hai fir bhi main aapko ek baar yuhi kar raha hu.
Customer: Ek baar aap check kar lijiye.
Executive: Aap baar baar sir aise aap complaint mat raise kariye thik hai maine aapko bol diya hai.
Customer: Mam maine baar baar nahi keh raha maine second second time kiya hai kyuki mujhe koi response nahi de raha tha kuch update nahi de raha tha maine unko call karke kiya to unhone mujhe confirm date nahi batai unhone sabse pehle to mujhe do din ka time diya tha do din ka maine wait kiya tha uske baad koi bhi confirm new update nahi di gayi thi uske liye mujhe majburi karna pada kyuki aap mujhe reply nahi de rahe the response nahi kar rahe the.
Customer: Kya?
Customer: Response nahi aaya tha mere paas inka do din ka time diya tha unhone do din mein aapka refund aa jayega but nahi aaya to uske against maine dobara complaint kiya.
Executive: Main samajh gayi hu process chal raha hai refund ho jayega aapka Saturday tak wait kijiye aap aapka refund ho jayega. Thik hai?
Customer: Thik hai mam main Saturday tak wait karta hu dekho uske baad wapas.
Executive: Iske baad main aapko bhi whatsapp pe hi kar rahi hu aap mujhe call karna agar aap koi bhi problem hoti hai to but ye need nahi hogi call karne ki aapko aayega nahi aisa ho jayega refund thik hai sir.
Customer: Thik hai thik hai thank you.
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer has not received refund yet.

- Charges are still being deducted.



Resolution:

- Executive assured refund will be processed by Saturday.

- Service has been downloaded.



Next Steps: 

- Executive will WhatsApp the customer.



Alert (If Any):

refund

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Satisfied



@@@Key Topics:

- refund, charges, service, download, date
